Race.SpecificTitle: School District No. 3 -- 8.47 Mills - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
SCHOOL DISTRICT NO. 3 PROPOSITION
(TAX CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR 8.47 MILLS PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION FOR PROVIDING ADDITIONAL SUPPORT TO THE PUBLIC SCHOOLS IN SAID DISTRICT, INCLUDING THE ACQUISITION, CONSTRUCTION AND/OR MAINTENANCE AND OPERATION OF SUCH FACILITIES.
Race.FullText: Shall School District No. 3 of the Parish of Allen, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to continue to levy an eight and forty-seven hundredths (8.47) mills tax (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $89,375) on all property subject to taxation in said District, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018, for the purpose of providing additional support to the public schools in said District, including the acquisition, construction and/or maintenance and operation of such facilities?

Race.SpecificTitle: School District No. 4 -- $2,035,000 Bond - SB - 20 Yr.
Race.SummaryText:
SCHOOL DISTRICT NO. 4 PROPOSITION
(BOND)

SUMMARY:  AUTHORITY TO ISSUE 20-YEAR BONDS TO THE AMOUNT OF $2,035,000 FOR THE PURPOSE OF IMPROVING BUILDING SITES AND PLAYGROUNDS, INCLUDING CONSTRUCTION OF NECESSARY SIDEWALKS AND STREETS ADJACENT THERETO; PURCHASING, ERECTING AND/OR IMPROVING SCHOOL BUILDINGS AND OTHER SCHOOL RELATED FACILITIES WITHIN AND FOR THE DISTRICT AND ACQUIRING THE NECESSARY EQUIPMENT AND FURNISHINGS THEREFOR, TITLE TO WHICH SHALL BE IN THE PUBLIC, TO BE PAYABLE FROM AD VALOREM TAXES.
Race.FullText: Shall School District No. 4 of Allen Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), incur debt and issue bonds to the amount of Two Million Thirty-Five Thousand Dollars ($2,035,000), to run twenty (20) years from date thereof, with interest at a rate not exceeding seven per centum (7%) per annum, for the purpose of improving building sites and playgrounds, including construction of necessary sidewalks and streets adjacent thereto; purchasing, erecting and/or improving school buildings and other school related facilities within and for the District and acquiring the necessary equipment and furnishings therefor, title to which shall be in the public; which bonds will be general obligations of the District and will be payable from ad valorem taxes to be levied and collected in the manner provided by Article VI, Section 33 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974 and statutory authority supplemental thereto?

Race.SpecificTitle: School District No. 25 -- $6,500,000 Bond - SB - 20 Yr.
Race.SummaryText:
SCHOOL DISTRICT NO. 25 PROPOSITION
(BOND)

SUMMARY:  AUTHORITY TO ISSUE 20-YEAR BONDS TO THE AMOUNT OF $6,500,000 FOR THE PURPOSE OF IMPROVING LANDS FOR BUILDING SITES AND PLAYGROUNDS, INCLUDING CONSTRUCTION OF NECESSARY SIDEWALKS AND STREETS ADJACENT THERETO; PURCHASING, ERECTING AND/OR IMPROVING SCHOOL BUILDINGS AND OTHER SCHOOL RELATED FACILITIES WITHIN AND FOR THE DISTRICT AND ACQUIRING THE NECESSARY EQUIPMENT AND FURNISHINGS THEREFOR, TITLE TO WHICH SHALL BE IN THE PUBLIC, TO BE PAYABLE FROM AD VALOREM TAXES.
Race.FullText: Shall School District No. 25 of the Parish of Allen, Louisiana (the "District"), incur debt and issue bonds to the amount of Six Million Five Hundred Thousand Dollars ($6,500,000), to run twenty (20) years from date thereof, with interest at a rate not exceeding seven per centum (7%) per annum, for the purpose of improving lands for building sites and playgrounds, including construction of necessary sidewalks and streets adjacent thereto; purchasing, erecting and/or improving school buildings and other school related facilities within and for the District and acquiring the necessary equipment and furnishings therefor, title to which shall be in the public, which bonds will be general obligations of the District and will be payable from ad valorem taxes to be levied and collected in the manner provided by Article VI, Section 33 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974 and statutory authority supplemental thereto?

Race.SpecificTitle: Recreation Dist. No. II -- 4.87 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
RECREATION DISTRICT NO. II PROPOSITION
(TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  10-YEAR 4.87 MILLS PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL FOR ACQUIRING, CONSTRUCTING, MAINTAINING AND OPERATING RECREATIONAL FACILITIES FOR THE DISTRICT (LAMBERT PARK), A WORK OF PUBLIC IMPROVEMENT THEREFOR.
Race.FullText: Shall Recreation District No. II of the Parish of Allen, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a four and eighty-seven hundredths (4.87) mills tax (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $123,693) on all property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, maintaining and operating recreational facilities for the District, a work of public improvement therefor?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection Dist. #3 -- 11.71 Mill - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
FIRE PROTECTION DISTRICT NO. 3 PROPOSITION
(TAX CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 11.71 MILLS PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION FOR ACQUIRING, CONSTRUCTING, IMPROVING, MAINTAINING AND/OR OPERATING FIRE PROTECTION FACILITIES AND EQUIPMENT IN AND FOR THE DISTRICT, AND PAYING THE COST OF OBTAINING WATER FOR FIRE PROTECTION PURPOSES.
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 3 of the Parish of Allen, State of Louisiana (the "District") be authorized to continue to levy a special tax of eleven and seventy-one hundredths (11.71) mills (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $42,320) on all the property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating fire protection facilities and equipment in and for the District, and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes?
